About me

I am a computer science undergrad with a deep interest in systems and their security. I love development in general. I play CTFs and wargames all the time, At some point wish to comptete and win in the prestigious DEFCON. I am extremely passionate about network security research and strongly believe in the Zero Trust idealology. I am also an incoming Information Security Masters student at Carnegie Mellon University.
